original_text: We ought always to give thanks to God for you, brothers, as is right, because your faith is growing abundantly, and the love of every one of you for one another is increasing.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리가 너희를 위하여 항상 하나님께 감사할지니 이것이 당연함은 너희의 믿음이 더욱 자라고 너희가 다 각기 서로 사랑함이 풍성함이니

sentences.original_text: We ought always to give thanks to God for you,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 항상 너희를 위해 하나님께 감사해야 하며,

sentences.original_text: because your faith is growing abundantly,
and the love of every one of you for one another is increasing.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자가 서로를 향한 사랑이 더욱 커지고 있습니다.
